title: Shadow and Act - speaker uses nickname

content.prompt: The speaker uses the matter of a nickname as a

choices.label: symbol for the comfort Parker's devotees derive from his memory
method of dispensing with uncomplimentary estimations of Parker
pretext for characterizing Parker and his musical technique
means of interjecting humor to temper the pathos surrounding Parker

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
